Utilities

Learn how to build your website with boba!

Text

A collection of classes to make styling your text a breeze.

Alignment

Easily align your text within a containing element.
Alignment
To change your text's alignment add a .text-{ALIGNMENT} class.
.text-left Add the .text-left class to make text left-aligned.
I'm left-aligned!
.text-center Add the .text-center class to make text center-aligned.
I'm center-aligned!
.text-right Add the .text-right class to make text right-aligned.
I'm right-aligned!
.text-justify

Add the .text-justify class to make text justified.

This only works when text spans more than one line.
I'm justifed!

Colors

Make your text stand out using boba's fresh colors.

Colors

Use any and all of boba's color palette to add a splash of color to your text.
Colors
To change the color of your text, add a .text-{COLOR} class.
.text-red Add the .text-red class to make your text red. Hello World, I'm red text!
.text-orange Add the .text-orange class to make your text orange. Hello World, I'm orange text!
.text-yellow Add the .text-yellow class to make your text yellow. Hello World, I'm yellow text!
.text-green Add the .text-green class to make your text green. Hello World, I'm green text!
.text-teal Add the .text-teal class to make your text teal. Hello World, I'm teal text!
.text-blue Add the .text-blue class to make your text blue. Hello World, I'm blue text!
.text-indigo Add the .text-indigo class to make your text indigo. Hello World, I'm indigo text!
.text-purple Add the .text-purple class to make your text purple. Hello World, I'm purple text!
.text-pink Add the .text-pink class to make your text pink. Hello World, I'm pink text!
.text-dark Add the .text-dark class to make your text dark. Hello World, I'm dark text!
.text-light Add the .text-light class to make your text light. Hello World, I'm light text!
.text-black Add the .text-black class to make your text black. Hello World, I'm black text!
.text-white Add the .text-white class to make your text white. Hello World, I'm white text!

Hover

For a more subtle effect, use the hover classes to change the color of your text only when someone hovers/focuses on it.
Hover
To change the color of your text on hover, add a .text-hover-{COLOR} class.
.text-hover-red Add the .text-hover-red class to make text red on hover. Hello World, I'm red on hover!
.text-hover-orange Add the .text-hover-orange class to make text orange on hover. Hello World, I'm orange on hover!
.text-hover-yellow Add the .text-hover-yellow class to make text yellow on hover. Hello World, I'm yellow on hover!
.text-hover-green Add the .text-hover-green class to make text green on hover. Hello World, I'm green on hover!
.text-hover-teal Add the .text-hover-teal class to make text teal on hover. Hello World, I'm teal on hover!
.text-hover-blue Add the .text-hover-blue class to make text blue on hover. Hello World, I'm blue on hover!
.text-hover-indigo Add the .text-hover-indigo class to make text indigo on hover. Hello World, I'm indigo on hover!
.text-hover-purple Add the .text-hover-purple class to make text purple on hover. Hello World, I'm purple on hover!
.text-hover-pink Add the .text-hover-pink class to make text pink on hover. Hello World, I'm pink on hover!
.text-hover-dark Add the .text-hover-dark class to make text dark on hover. Hello World, I'm dark on hover!
.text-hover-light Add the .text-hover-light class to make text light on hover. Hello World, I'm light on hover!
.text-hover-black Add the .text-hover-black class to make text black on hover. Hello World, I'm black on hover!
.text-hover-white Add the .text-hover-white class to make text white on hover. Hello World, I'm white on hover!

Active

For an even more subtle effect, use the active classes to change the color of your text only when someone clicks on it.
Active
To change the color of your text on click, add a .text-active-{COLOR} class.
.text-active-red Add the .text-active-red class to make text red on active. Hello World, I'm red on active!
.text-active-orange Add the .text-active-orange class to make text orange on active. Hello World, I'm orange on active!
.text-active-yellow Add the .text-active-yellow class to make text yellow on active. Hello World, I'm yellow on active!
.text-active-green Add the .text-active-green class to make text green on active. Hello World, I'm green on active!
.text-active-teal Add the .text-active-teal class to make text teal on active. Hello World, I'm teal on active!
.text-active-blue Add the .text-active-blue class to make text blue on active. Hello World, I'm blue on active!
.text-active-indigo Add the .text-active-indigo class to make text indigo on active. Hello World, I'm indigo on active!
.text-active-purple Add the .text-active-purple class to make text purple on active. Hello World, I'm purple on active!
.text-active-pink Add the .text-active-pink class to make text pink on active. Hello World, I'm pink on active!
.text-active-dark Add the .text-active-dark class to make text dark on active. Hello World, I'm dark on active!
.text-active-light Add the .text-active-light class to make text light on active. Hello World, I'm light on active!
.text-active-black Add the .text-active-black class to make text black on active. Hello World, I'm black on active!
.text-active-white Add the .text-active-white class to make text white on active. Hello World, I'm white on active!

Combinations

Combine the various text helper classes to create the perfect text.
Red, Hover-Green, Active-Blue
<h5 class="text-red text-hover-green text-active-blue"> Red, Hover-Green, Active-Blue </h5>

Extended

Additional utilities to help you further fine-tune text to your needs.

Clarification

These classes are only included in the extended version of boba.
